title: In Doctor Sleep, why is Snakebite Andi accepted into the True Knot, instead of getting tortured for her steam? And can she hypnotize people or just make them sleep? - Quora

response.answer_text: Because she had a talent that none of them had and was very handy. She could kind of hypnotize people. They would fall asleep and they could do whatever they wanted. I think that that was a weapon in the arsenal of the “true knot” that was very useful.
